lead_paragraph: It ended, as it all began, in a rush of light. But even the brilliance of its mirrored corridors, twinkling trees and shimmering heirloom chandeliers could not avert the bankruptcy blackout of Tavern on the Green.
snippet: Glenn Collins attends the farewell party for Tavern on the Green.

headline.main: Ringing Out Tavern on the Green

abstract: Glenn Collins attends the farewell party for Tavern on the Green.
